title: Android 13 Developer Preview 2 arrives with notification permission requests and other changes
content:
February saw the release of the first Android 13 Developer Preview, and with it came the groundwork for the next iteration of the world’s biggest operating system. It brought along a number of changes that benefit developers and made improvements to privacy, Material You, language controls, and more. Now the company has announced the second

The post Android 13 Developer Preview 2 arrives with notification permission requests and other changes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 Developer Preview 2 is here, and it packs notification permission requests and developer productivity improvements. Check it out.
